if(data.remainingTeams.length===1){const nextDate=new Date();nextDate.setDate(nextDate.getDate()+7);setNextPresenter("Next time presenter: ".concat(data.remainingTeams[0].name," on ").concat(formatDate(nextDate)));}}catch(error){console.error("Failed to select a team:",error);}};const handleReset=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch("http://localhost:5000/teams");const data=await response.json();setTeams(data.activeTeams);// Resetează echipele disponibile
